018package net.sf.hajdbc.cache.eager;
019
020import java.sql.DatabaseMetaData;
021import java.sql.SQLException;
022import java.util.Collection;
023import java.util.Map;
024
025import net.sf.hajdbc.ColumnProperties;
026import net.sf.hajdbc.ForeignKeyConstraint;
027import net.sf.hajdbc.QualifiedName;
028import net.sf.hajdbc.UniqueConstraint;
029import net.sf.hajdbc.cache.AbstractTableProperties;
030import net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataSupport;
031
032/**
033 * @author Paul Ferraro
034 *
035 */
036public class EagerTableProperties extends AbstractTableProperties
037{
038        private Map<String, ColumnProperties> columnMap;
039        private UniqueConstraint primaryKey;
040        private Collection<UniqueConstraint> uniqueConstraints;
041        private Collection<ForeignKeyConstraint> foreignKeyConstraints;
042        private Collection<String> identityColumns;
043        
044        public EagerTableProperties(DatabaseMetaData metaData, DatabaseMetaDataSupport support, QualifiedName table) throws SQLException
045        {
046                super(table);
047                
048                this.columnMap = support.getColumns(metaData, table);
049                this.primaryKey = support.getPrimaryKey(metaData, table);
050                this.uniqueConstraints = support.getUniqueConstraints(metaData, table, this.primaryKey);
051                this.foreignKeyConstraints = support.getForeignKeyConstraints(metaData, table);
052                this.identityColumns = support.getIdentityColumns(this.columnMap.values());
053        }
054
055        @Override
056        protected Map<String, ColumnProperties> getColumnMap()
057        {
058                return this.columnMap;
059        }
060
061        /**
062         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.TableProperties#getPrimaryKey()
063         */
064        @Override
065        public UniqueConstraint getPrimaryKey()
066        {
067                return this.primaryKey;
068        }
069
070        /**
071         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.TableProperties#getForeignKeyConstraints()
072         */
073        @Override
074        public Collection<ForeignKeyConstraint> getForeignKeyConstraints()
075        {
076                return this.foreignKeyConstraints;
077        }
078
079        /**
080         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.TableProperties#getUniqueConstraints()
081         */
082        @Override
083        public Collection<UniqueConstraint> getUniqueConstraints()
084        {
085                return this.uniqueConstraints;
086        }
087
088        /**
089         * @see net.sf.hajdbc.TableProperties#getIdentityColumns()
090         */
091        @Override
092        public Collection<String> getIdentityColumns() throws SQLException
093        {
094                return this.identityColumns;
095        }
096}
